page.title: 06 Clubs in Buckley
page.content: Buckley has a wide range of things for people to do.there is a sports centre which offers all kinds of sport. I go to Buckley Gym Club in the large gymnasium on Tuesdays and Fridays. In Buckley alone there are 3 cub-scouts packs and brownies. We have two mens football teams,Buckley Wanderers and Hawksbury Villa. I used to watch Hawkesbury Villa play. In Buckley about 10 years ago there were 3 teams. The third was Buckley Rovers. For teenagers n Buckley there is the Under 18 Pool Club. Lots of men in Buckley go fishing in the Trap. They often have matches. There is a dancing class for girls at the Tabernacle Sunday school. The cricket club at Lane End plays every week. Every summer is a playscheme involving games and visits to pools and icerinks regulary.
